verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
True hearted wholehearted
Faithful and loyal
King of our lives
By Thy grace we will be
Under the standard exalted and royal
Strong in Thy strength
We will battle for Thee

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Peal (peal) out the watchword
Silence (silence) it never
Song (song) of our spirits rejoicing and free
Peal (peal) out the watchword
Loyal (loyal) forever
King (King) of our lives
By Thy grace we will be

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
True hearted wholehearted
Fullest allegiance
Yieldingh henceforth to our glorious King
Valiant endeavor and loving obedience
Freely and joyously now we would bring

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
True hearted wholehearted
Savior all glorious
Take Thy great power
And reign there alone
Over our wills and affections victorious
Freely surrendered
And wholly Thine own
